definition: to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天过得很棒，但我在水里把自己给晒伤了。

sentences.english: Direct fetal injury is an infrequent complication of blunt trauma.
sentences.chinese: 胎儿直接损伤是钝器伤的罕见并发症。

sentences.english: Premium solvent, odourless and no harmful to skin.
sentences.chinese: 优质溶剂，无气味，不伤皮肤。

sentences.english: They might be,for example,in an accident, and come close to being killed,but walk away without a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 比如说在事故中幸存，差点送命，但结果毫发无伤。

sentences.english: Increased positive feelings and reduced feelings of anxiety, anger and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 增加正面的工作情绪，减少紧张，愤怒及懮伤。

sentences.english: Three people were hospitalized with minor lacerations.
sentences.chinese: 有三个人因轻微撕裂伤住院。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the temple is believed to have escaped any damage.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，神庙毫发无伤。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the happen of nurses' injuries caused by sharp instruments and the preventive countermeasures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨锐器伤的发生情况与防范对策。

sentences.english: But it rooted in my heart deeply.
Last Thursday the nurse hurt her finger and it turned black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 上周四这护士伤了他的手指，手指变得又青有紫。

sentences.english: Objective To study the dose-effects relationship of underwater blast injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨水下冲击伤的量效关系。

sentences.english: Objective Understanding ingredient blood of feeding in unite rescuing traffic incidents curative effect observing.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解成分血联合输注抢救交通伤的疗效观察。

sentences.english: The crippled child tumbled down the stairs and was badly hurt .
sentences.chinese: 这个残疾小孩从楼梯上摔了下来，伤的很重。

sentences.english: You are the reason why I became stronger. But still, you are my weakness.
sentences.chinese: 因为你，我学会了牛劲，而你，依旧是我的伤。

sentences.english: Pang shot an arrow at Guan who was unable to dodge it.
sentences.chinese: 庞德取箭，关羽躲闪不及中箭，回营养伤。

sentences.english: Efficient without a good soak decontamination vigorously scrub, do not hurt the clothing does not hurt the hand.
sentences.chinese: 高效好泡去污无需大力搓洗，不伤衣物不伤手。

definition: to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
internal injury/disorder of internal organs (due to improper nutrition, overexertion etc)
to recover completely (from illness or injury)
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
